title: The Big Suey: Closer To The Beach
description:
Ricky Williams joins the show to discuss dealing with full body cramps, how many rushing yards he'd get if he returned to football today, and a further conversation about Tom Brady. Then, comedian Neal Brennan brings his perspective on LIV Golf, Robert Sarver, Kyrie Irving, and various other basketball controversies.
